cancelAllOffchainOrders(uint128).details: Reverts if the sender is not the trading account owner or it does not exist.By increasing the `tradingAccount.nonce` value, all offchain orders signed with the previous nonce won't be able to be filled.If for some reason the trading account owner has signed offchain orders with nonce values higher than the current nonce, and the new nonce value matches those values, the offchain orders will become fillable. Offchain actors must enforce signing orders with the latest nonce value.

cancelMarketOrder(uint128).details: Reverts if the sender is not the trading account owner, if it doesn't exist, or if there is no active market order for the given trading account.

params.lowerBound: The lower bound of the accounts to check
params.upperBound: The upper bound of the accounts to check

params.collateralTypes: The array of collateral type addresses.

params.enable: The array of boolean values that enable or disable the liquidator.

params.collateralType: The address of the collateral type.
params.depositCap: The maximum amount of collateral that can be deposited.
params.loanToValue: The value used to calculate the effective margin balance of a given collateral type.
params.priceFeedHeartbeatSeconds: The time in seconds between price feed updates.

params.sequencerUptimeFeedAddresses: The array of sequencer uptime feed addresses.

params.marketOrderMinLifetime: The minimum lifetime of a market order to be considered active.
params.maxPositionsPerAccount: The maximum number of open positions per account.

params.data: The data payload to be multicalled.

returns.results: The array of results of the multicall.

params.amount: The amount of margin collateral to deposit.

params.priceData: The price data of market order.

fillOffchainOrders(uint128,(uint128,uint.details: If a trading account id owner transfers their account to another address, all offchain orders will be considered cancelled.

params.offchainOrders: The array of signed custom orders.
params.priceData: The price data of custom orders.

getAccountEquityUsd(uint128).details: This function doesn't take open positions into account.

returns._0: equityUsdX18 The USD denominated total margin collateral value.

getAccountMarginBreakdown(uint128).details: This function does take open positions data such as unrealized pnl into account.The margin balance value takes into account the margin collateral's configured ratio (LTV).If the account's maintenance margin rate rises to 100% or above (MMR >= 1e18), the liquidation engine will be triggered.

returns.initialMarginUsdX18: The account's initial margin in positions.

returns._0: marginCollateralBalanceX18 The margin collateral amount of the given collateral type.

params.lowerBound: The lower bound of the accounts to retrieve.
params.upperBound: The upper bound of the accounts to retrieve.

params.tradingAccountId: The trading account id to get the active market

returns._0: The order fees for the given market.
referrer The address of the referrer.

getMarginCollateralConfiguration(address.details: Returns the maximum amount that can be deposited as margin for a given collateral type.

params.collateralType: The address of the collateral type.

returns._0: marginCollateralConfiguration The configuration parameters of the given collateral type.

params.settlementConfigurationId: The perp market settlement configuration id.
params.sizeDelta: The size delta of the order.

returns.initialMarginUsdX18: The initial margin requirement for the given trade.
returns.maintenanceMarginUsdX18: The maintenance margin requirement for the given trade.

getMarkPrice(uint128,uint256,int256).details: It returns the adjusted price if the market's skew is being updated.

params.skewDelta: The size of the skew update.

getOpenInterest(uint128).details: E.g: There is 500 ETH in long positions and 450 ETH in short positions, this function should return UD60x18 longsOpenInterest = 500e18 and UD60x18 shortsOpenInterest = 450e18;

returns.longsOpenInterest: The open interest in long positions.
returns.shortsOpenInterest: The open interest in short positions.
returns.totalOpenInterest: The sum of longsOpenInterest and shortsOpenInterest.

returns.initialMarginRateX18: The minimum initial margin rate for the market.
returns.maintenanceMarginRateX18: The maintenance margin rate for the market.
returns.maxOpenInterest: The maximum open interest for the market.
returns.maxSkew: The maximum skew for the market.
returns.minTradeSizeX18: The minimum trade size of the market.
returns.name: The market name.
returns.orderFees: The configured maker and taker order fees of the market.
returns.skewScale: The configured skew scale of the market.

params.settlementConfigurationId: The perps market settlement configuration id

returns._1: isCustomReferralCode A boolean indicating if the referral code is custom.

initialize(address,address).details: The Ownable contract is initialized at the UpgradeBranch.{GlobalConfigurationBranch} UUPS initializer.

params.accountsIds: The list of accounts to liquidate

notifyAccountTransfer(address,uint128).details: Can only be called by the Account NFT contract.It updates the Trading Account stored access control data.

params.to: The recipient of the account transfer.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.collateralType: The address of the collateral type to remove.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

simulateTrade(uint128,uint128,uint128,in.details: Reverts if there's not enough margin to cover the trade.

params.settlementConfigurationId: The perp market settlement configuration id.
params.sizeDelta: The size delta of the order.

returns.marginBalanceUsdX18: The given account's current margin balance.
returns.requiredInitialMarginUsdX18: The required initial margin to settle the given trade.
returns.requiredMaintenanceMarginUsdX18: The required maintenance margin to settle the given trade.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updatePerpMarketConfiguration(uint128,(s.details: A market's configuration must be updated with caution, as the update of some variables may directly impact open positions.See {UpdatePerpMarketConfigurationParams}.

params.enable: Whether the market should be enabled or disabled.

params.settlementConfigurationId: The perp market settlement configuration id.

params.amount: The UD60x18 amount of margin collateral to withdraw.

configureMarginCollateral(address,uint12.notice: Configures the settings of a given margin collateral type.

configureSequencerUptimeFeedByChainId(ui.notice: Configures the sequencer uptime feed by chain id.

createMarketOrder((uint128,uint128,int12.notice: Creates a market order for the given trading account and market ids.

createPerpMarket((uint128,string,string,.notice: Creates a new market with the requested market id.

createTradingAccount(bytes,bool).notice: Creates a new trading account and mints its NFT

createTradingAccountAndMulticall(bytes[].notice: Creates a new trading account and multicalls using the provided data payload.

depositMargin(uint128,address,uint256).notice: Deposits margin collateral into the given trading account.

fillMarketOrder(uint128,uint128,bytes).notice: Fills a pending market order created by the given trading account id at a given market id.

fillOffchainOrders(uint128,(uint128,uint.notice: Fills pending, eligible offchain offchain orders targeting the given market id.

getAccountEquityUsd(uint128).notice: Returns the total equity of all assets under the trading account without considering the collateral value ratio

getAccountLeverage(uint128).notice: Returns the current leverage of a given account id, based on its cross margin collateral and open positions.

getAccountMarginBreakdown(uint128).notice: Returns the trading account's total margin balance, available balance and maintenance margin.

getAccountMarginCollateralBalance(uint12.notice: Returns the account's margin amount of the given collateral type.

getAccountTotalUnrealizedPnl(uint128).notice: Returns the total trading account's unrealized pnl across open positions.

getCustomReferralCodeReferrer(string).notice: Returns the address of custom referral code

getFundingRate(uint128).notice: Returns the given market's funding rate.

getFundingVelocity(uint128).notice: Returns the given market's funding velocity.

getMarkPrice(uint128,uint256,int256).notice: Returns the given market's mark price based on the offchain price.

getMaxOpenInterest(uint128).notice: Returns the maximum total open interest of the given market.

getMaxSkew(uint128).notice: Returns the maximum skew in one of the market's sides.

getName(uint128).notice: Returns the given perps market name.

getOpenInterest(uint128).notice: Returns the given market's open interest, including the size of longs and shorts.

getPerpMarketConfiguration(uint128).notice: Returns the most relevant data of the given market.

getPositionState(uint128,uint128,uint256.notice: Gets the given market's position state.

getSettlementConfiguration(uint128,uint1.notice: Returns a Settlement Strategy used by the given market.

getSymbol(uint128).notice: Returns the given perps market symbol.

getTradingAccountToken().notice: Gets the contract address of the trading accounts NFTs.

notifyAccountTransfer(address,uint128).notice: Used by the Account NFT contract to notify an account transfer.

removeCollateralFromLiquidationPriority(.notice: Removes the given collateral type from the collateral priority.

setTradingAccountToken(address).notice: Sets the address of the account token NFT contract.

setUsdToken(address).notice: Sets the address of the usd token.

simulateTrade(uint128,uint128,uint128,in.notice: Simulates the settlement costs and validity of a given order.

updatePerpMarketConfiguration(uint128,(s.notice: Updates the configuration variables of the given perp market id.

updatePerpMarketStatus(uint128,bool).notice: Enables or disabled the perp market of the given market id.

updateSettlementConfiguration(uint128,ui.notice: Updates the settlement configuration of a given market.

withdrawMargin(uint128,address,uint256).notice: Withdraws available margin collateral from the given trading account.
